title: PatriciaTree failure at Ropsten 1695216
body:

might be a db corruption as this time got it for block at 2.9M

A few things:
* build the newest version of RocksDB (this is covered in another issue)
* fix the app closing - properly close DBs on application exit
* add option to rebuild DB going backwards until the key is found (but need to analyze the sense of doing it) 

as part of the investigation - rebuild until the hash is found:
0x6281e888d37c430fb2fa6a78c0bbfdb3a0668247120346fb2e807a6260ca5efa

that was RocksDB, seems ot be resolved after the new RocksDB build
